name: Abducted (itch) (Fat Duck Games)
description:
Abducted is an experimental 3D physics-based alien abduction game. The game was created for the GMTKJam 2020 with the theme 'out of control'.
Inspired by Pixar's short film Lifted, the player has to abduct a human  as fast as they can by pressing literally any key on keyboard, mouse and controller! The players input gets randomized each game round and every single key makes the spaceships's beam perform a different action. Abducted was made by Jan Plähn and Ana Laura Martinez in 48 hours.

Players can upload their time to the online ranking score board :)

CONTROLS

Every Button or Key - Move,  Dash or Rotate 

SCREENSHOTS
